quizContext: Test your knowledge on Data Structures in Java Programming

questions.question: What is a data structure in Java?

options.a: A way to store and organize data
options.c: A type of loop in Java

questions.question: Which data structure is used to store elements in a sorted order in Java?
What is the time complexity of adding an element to the end of an ArrayList in Java?
Which data structure uses LIFO (Last In First Out) order in Java?
What is the purpose of a HashMap in Java?

options.a: To store elements in a sorted order
options.c: To store elements in a stack
options.d: To store elements in a queue
